title: chatservice
body: for the past 3 days i have problems logging into my chat service. anybody know what i can do to fix this?

replies.body: This is a known issue that's currently being worked on.  I don't have information on a fix, but updates will be provided on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw) page.  Let me know if you still have issues after it's been resolved!
